overview: Collection of three short films from Nova. "Beached" — It only takes one look at a muscular, young scuba diver and Bill's mind is racing with a wild sexual fantasy.  "Delivering A Load" — A delivery of tools brings a hunky trucker with another load to deliver.  "Backfield In Motion" — A little lockerroom horseplay soon turns into a passionate sexual free-for-all from the gym to the shower.
title: Beached!
